summary:
This simple little spell is just an alternative to the Candlelight Spell.
I was not too keen on the harshness of the original so I redid the spell as an Orange Glow.
The radius and duration of the spell have been increased too.
descriptionHtml:
Hi,

Thank you for downloading and trying SoulMaster\'s Mageglow Spell.

This simple little spell is just an alternative to the Candlelight Spell.
I was not too keen on the harshness of the original so I redid the spell as an Orange Glow.
The radius and duration of the spell have been increased too.

I\'m aware that there are a few mods that do the same or similar, I made this for myself and decided to share in case anyone else was interested.

Obtaining the Mageglow Spell:
Farengar in Dragonsreach will sell the Mageglow Spell Tome to you.
Just read it and learn like any other spell.

Installation:
Install with Nexus Mod Manager.
If you want to install manually then copy the .esp in to your Skyrim Data Folder.

Please feel free to leave any comments, suggestions or bug reports.

I hope you find SoulMaster\'s Mageglow Spell useful!

[color=#00FFFF]Please take note: If you are using a pirated (ie non Steam enabled) version of the game, please do not leave comments about how this part of my mod or that is not working on your game! I am not prepared to waste my time trying to help you out with your illegal software! I\'m unemployed, but still manage to pay for my games (they are what keep me sane) so if I can, you should be able to as well![/color]

SoulMasterII

[IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p535/mike_patrick1/sm0g9rv24znf_zps9d795d9a.gif[/IMG]

[color=#FFFF00]Please, DO NOT upload any part of my mods anywhere else![/color]
author: SoulMasterII
